issue.message: Lint found an issue registry (`androidx.lifecycle.lint.LiveDataCoreIssueRegistry`) which requires a newer API level. That means that the custom lint checks are intended for a newer lint version; please upgrade.

Requires newer lint; these checks **will be skipped**!
Lint found an issue registry (`androidx.navigation.common.lint.NavigationCommonIssueRegistry`) which was compiled against a newer version of lint than this one. This is usually fine, but not in this case; some basic verification shows that the lint check jar references (for example) the following API which is not valid in the version of lint which is running: org.jetbrains.kotlin.analysis.api.session.KaSessionProvider: void afterLeavingAnalysis(org.jetbrains.kotlin.analysis.api.KaSession,org.jetbrains.kotlin.psi.KtElement) (Referenced from androidx/navigation/lint/UtilKt.class)
Therefore, this lint check library is **not** included in analysis. This affects the following lint checks: `EmptyNavDeepLink`,`WrongStartDestinationType`,`MissingSerializableAnnotation`,`MissingKeepAnnotation`
To use this lint check, upgrade to a more recent version of lint.
Version of Lint API this lint check is using is 16. The Lint API version currently running is 14 (8.0 and 8.1).

Requires newer lint; these checks **will be skipped**!
Lint found an issue registry (`androidx.navigation.runtime.lint.NavigationRuntimeIssueRegistry`) which was compiled against a newer version of lint than this one. This is usually fine, but not in this case; some basic verification shows that the lint check jar references (for example) the following API which is not valid in the version of lint which is running: org.jetbrains.kotlin.analysis.api.session.KaSessionProvider: void afterLeavingAnalysis(org.jetbrains.kotlin.analysis.api.KaSession,org.jetbrains.kotlin.psi.KtElement) (Referenced from androidx/navigation/lint/UtilKt.class)
Therefore, this lint check library is **not** included in analysis. This affects the following lint checks: `DeepLinkInActivityDestination`,`WrongStartDestinationType`,`WrongNavigateRouteType`,`MissingKeepAnnotation`,`MissingSerializableAnnotation`
To use this lint check, upgrade to a more recent version of lint.
Version of Lint API this lint check is using is 16. The Lint API version currently running is 14 (8.0 and 8.1).
Implicitly using the default locale is a common source of bugs: Use `String.format(Locale, ...)` instead
issue.errorLine1: val formattedTime = String.format("%02d:%02d:%02d", h, m, s)
